identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: Creative Designer who blends 'Performance Pro' with 'Soft Utility'. Prioritizes emotion, content, and negative space over generic trends.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix IOS softness with high-performance data density.
Emotion First: The app should feel 'encouraging' and 'effortless'.
Content is King: Data (weights, reps) is the hero. Everything else is support.
Zoom In: Focus on the current set. Everything else blurs away.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load during heavy lifts.
anti_patterns: No generic 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope' for character.
No center-everything. Use asymmetry for interest.
No heavy gradients. Use soft, diffuse light.
No jagged charts. Use smooth curves with gradients.
No 'Confirm' modals for every action. Make it fluid.

layout_strategy.container: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-4xl px-4 md:px-8 py-6

Card.style: rounded-3xl border-0 shadow-card bg-card/80 backdrop-blur-xl transition-all

Input.style: rounded-2xl border-transparent bg-secondary/50 focus:bg-background focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all text-lg font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

Chart.style: Use AreaChart with <defs> for gradients. StrokeWidth={3}. Dot={false}. Tooltip with custom rounded content.

visual_enhancers.noise: opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')]

animations.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeOut' }}
animations.stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

day_1_bg.desc: Abstract geometric shapes for Day 1 Card

day_2_bg.desc: Abstract pastel shapes for Day 2 Card

day_3_bg.desc: Colorful abstract sun for Day 3 Card

empty_state.desc: Soft spheres for empty states or hero

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME: Implement the 'Soft Performance' theme. Use 'Manrope' for all headings and data. This is non-negotiable.
2. NO AUTH: The app must start directly on the Dashboard. No login, no signup. Store a 'default_user_id' in local storage if needed for API.
3. MOBILE FIRST: The layout must be optimized for touch. Buttons min-height 48px. Inputs min-height 50px.
4. SOFT CHARTS: Use 'Recharts' AreaChart. Add a <defs> linearGradient to fill the area with opacity. Stroke width 3px.
5. DATA-TESTID: Every button, input, and card MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'workout-day-card-1').

6. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for general UI. Use 'react-icons/gi' for specific muscles if needed. If 'Gi' icons feel too 'gamey', fallback to generic 'lucide-react' icons but styled with 'text-primary'.
7. PRE-LOADED DATA: Seed the database or state with 3 days of workout data (Push, Pull, Legs or similar).
8. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list staggering. It makes the app feel native.
9. TABS: Use a bottom navigation bar for mobile (Home, History, Settings).
10. CARD STYLING: Do not use default Shadcn cards. Add 'rounded-3xl' and 'border-0' and 'shadow-sm' to them.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures separates good from extraordinary.
